data.title: Who were the sons of Aurangzeb?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 10): Aurangzeb had several sons, but the most notable ones were:

1. Muhammad Azam Shah: He was Aurangzeb's eldest son and was appointed as the governor of Bengal at the age of 17. He later served as the governor of Gujarat and was appointed as the viceroy of the Deccan. Azam Shah wa...
